#include<stdio.h>
int arr[1001];
void pre()
{
     arr[1]=arr[2]=1;
     int i,j;
     for(i=3;i<=1000;i++)
     {
                         for(j=1;j<i;j++)
                         arr[i]=(arr[i]+((arr[j]*arr[i-j])%10000))%10000;
     }
}
main()
{
      pre();
      int t;
      scanf("%d",&t);
      while(t--)
      {
                int n;
                scanf("%d",&n);
                if(n==0)
                printf("0\n");
                printf("%d\n",arr[n]%10000);
      }
}
